thread.title: Riser Ford Nissan Adult Tennis Tournament held at Tennis Center
thread.title_full: Riser Ford Nissan Adult Tennis Tournament held at Tennis Center

author: hdmoadmin
title: Riser Ford Nissan Adult Tennis Tournament held at Tennis Center
text:
6:02 am - October 20, 2015 Riser Ford Nissan Adult Tennis Tournament held at Tennis Center Men’s 3.5 singles: Champion Peter Newey Men’s 4.0 singles: Finalist Bruce Turkle (HSV), left, lost to champion Geoffrey Synco (Humnoke) 
This event has been held annually in September for several years, and is sanctioned by ATA, a division of USTA. The tournament consists of singles and doubles in 3.0, 3.5 and 4.0 levels. The weather was extremely good this year without the intense heat or rain of some years in the past. It is open to players from all over the state, as well as bordering states. 
Winners are as follows: 
Women’s 3.5 singles: Finalist Dale Flory (HSV) lost to champion Sandra Lavdas (HSV) Men’s 3.0 singles: Finalist Val Robison (Texarkana) lost to champion Chance Greenhagen (Little Rock) Men’s 3.5 singles: Champion Peter Newey (Little Rock) over finalist Kris Piva (HSV) 
Men’s 4.0 singles:Finalist Bruce Turkle (HSV) lost to champion Geoffrey Synco (Humnoke) 
Women’s 3.0 doubles: Champions Jamie Federick and Carol Duncan (HSV) over finalists Rena Verucchi and Joann Privitello (Hot Springs) 
Women’s 3.5 doubles: Champions Gekka Farrar and Sandra Lavdas (HSV) over finalists Dale Flory and Nicole DeLacruz (HSV) 
Men’s 4.0 doubles: Champions Allen Holmes and Dennis Brown (HSV) over finalists David Flory and Pat White (HSV)
